author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Scanfil Estimates 2018 Operating Profit At EUR 36-40 Million
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - SCANFIL OYJ:
* SCANFIL PLC UPLIFTS ITS TURNOVER AND OPERATING PROFIT OUTLOOK FOR 2018
* ESTIMATES THAT 2018 TURNOVER WILL BE APPROXIMATELY EUR 545 - 585 MILLION AND OPERATING PROFIT EUR 36 - 40 MILLION
* CUSTOMER DEMAND IS EXPECTED TO BE STRONGER THAN ESTIMATED FOR REMAINING PART OF 2018
* PREVIOUS FY ESTIMATE WAS THAT ITS TURNOVER FOR 2018 WILL BE EUR 530 - 570 MILLION AND OPERATING PROFIT WAS ESTIMATED TO BE EUR 33 - 37 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
